title.rendered: 35% OFF Toys + New Arrivals + Author Event

content.rendered:
Biggest Melissa & Doug Sale Ever!

Now through February 27 get 35% OFF all in-store Melissa & Doug products!

Featured in Mercer University’s The Cluster

Shane Gottwals and Gottwals Books were featured in The Cluster – MercerCluster.com! Check out the article.

New for Teens: Salt to the Sea by Ruta Sepetys

For readers of Between Shades of Gray and All the Light We Cannot See, international bestselling author Ruta Sepetys weaves a beautiful tale inspired by the true events of a little-known WWII tragedy. Pick up a copy today!

Amazing Inventory Arriving This Week!

This week we are stocking our shelves with amazing inventory at fabulous prices. Cookbooks, Bibles, history books, children’s picture books, Geronimo Stilton, Magic Tree House, Ellen Hopkins, Lois Lowry, Artemis Fowl, Ranger’s Apprentice, and so much more!

Upcoming Event: Author Signing on February 27
